abstract: Human rights advocates say Pres Obama is too concerned with improving ties between United States and India, and should focus more on issues of domestic workers, human trafficking, free expression, gay rights and political intimidation during his Indian visit.
lead_paragraph: As President Obama visits India to improve the strained relationship between the two countries, some human rights groups hope their concerns are not swept under the rug.
snippet: As President Obama visits India to improve the strained relationship between the two countries, some human rights groups hope their concerns are not swept under the rug.
